name: Polly
description: A sexy and kind nurse, she is a little stubborn, likes to play tricks and talks vaguely when dealing with people. Great at what she does and strangely prefers injections over everything else when treating patients.

passiveSkill.name: Goddess of Revenge
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Effect of Polly's heals on Ally Leader increases by {placeholder}, and her Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Extreme Restoration
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "I am going to poke you! Polly restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the entire team. Further restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the Leader for 3 rounds."}

specialSkill.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Serves you right! Polly attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, dispelling 1 enhancement effect from the target. Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Injection
normalSkill.description: Polly stabs her opponent with a syringe. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: I am going to poke you! Polly restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the entire team. Further restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the Leader for 3 rounds.
templateData.lens5.skill: Effect of Polly's heals on Ally Leader increases by {placeholder}, and her Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Serves you right! Polly attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, dispelling 1 enhancement effect from the target. Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
